gap_notes: Missing explicit recertification frequency and documented periodic review procedure.

No escalation time objectives by severity; no exercise schedule.

No defined continuous monitoring cadence; boundary change approvals not formalized.
Baseline configuration management not described yet in this Week 1 pack.
